name: Porkies
description:
Porkies is a 2-player only local multi-player game where players battle against each other to collect food and earn points. The fastest player to reach 300 points wins.

You need to pick up food and bring it back to your plate, and try to stop your opponent from doing the same by throwing food at them! Heavier food is slower to carry but you will get more points! There are also food with status effects, but be careful if you eat these!!!

Submission for the Good Eats Food Jam with the theme "Buffet"

Controls:

X-Box Controller
Keyboard (Player 1)
Keyboard (Player 2)MoveLeft Stick
WASDDirectional Keys
Pick up Food
AENumber Pad 2Throw /Place Food
XRNumber Pad 3Eat Food
BQNumber Pad 1DashYSpaceNumber Pad 0

-
